items.name: Apple TV (Choose 32 or 64 GB)
items.categoryPath: Electronics/TV & Video/Media Players & Recorders/Media Streaming Players
items.shortDescription: Discover a whole new way to watch TV, play video games and more with the Apple TV 32GB. This incredible device instantly streams content from some of the most popular services like Netflix, Hulu and even HBO NOW, as well as iTunes and WatchESPN. The Apple TV with 1080p HD connects you instantly with the App Store where you can purchase thousands of games, fitness apps, educational content and more. The system is designed for easy use with an interactive Siri Remote that works just like Siri on your iPhone. Simply ask Siri to pull up a streaming service or an app and within seconds, you're ready to watch whatever you want. The Siri Remote features a virtual directional pad as well as manual controls. The Apple TV with remote delivers 1080p HD with Dolby Digital 7.1 sound for truly immersive viewing. The system is compatible with high-definition TVs with HDMI, for added convenience.
items.longDescription: <p>The Apple TV 32GB makes it easy to watch streaming video content from some of the world's most beloved sources including HBO, Netflix, Hulu and ESPN. The included Siri remote makes operation effortless. The remote can also double as a dynamic game controller so you can play video games in true high-definition easily, for even more fun!<br><strong><br>Apple TV 32GB:</strong></p><ul><li>Enjoy your favorite content from apps such as HBO NOW, WatchESPN, Netflix, Hulu, iTunes and more, all on the new Apple TV<sup>2</sup></li><li>Experience big, exciting games as well as apps that turn your living room into a fitness studio, a classroom, and more with the App Store on Apple TV</li><li>Use your voice and touch to interact directly with the new, immersive Apple TV interface</li><li>Easily search for content and launch apps on the Apple TV with 1080p HD; just ask Siri using the Siri Remote<sup>3</sup></li><li>Use the Siri Remote as a dynamic game controller, with the Touch surface acting as a virtual directional pad</li><li>Effortlessly navigate through content and screens on Apple TV using the glass Touch surface on the Siri Remote</li><li>Watch 1080p HD with Dolby Digital 7.1 surround sound</li><li>The new Apple TV is compatible with high-definition TVs with HDMI<sup>4</sup></li></ul><p><sup>1</sup> Subscription may be required to access some content. Live sports subject to blackouts.</p><p><sup>2</sup> <span lang="PT">HBO NOW<sup>SM</sup> is accessible only in the U.S. and certain U.S. territories where a high-speed broadband connection is available. Minimum 3G connection is required for viewing on mobile devices. HBO®<span lang="PT">, HBO NOW<sup>SM</sup>, and related channels and service marks are the property of Home Box Office, Inc. WatchESPN is free for users who receive ESPN as part of their cable or satellite TV subscription from participating providers. ESPN3 is free for users with participating high-speed Internet service providers. Selected titles now available on Netflix. Netflix subscription required. Hulu subscription required for streaming content.</span></span></p><p><sup>3</sup> Siri may not be available in all languages or in all areas, and features may vary by area.</p><p><sup>4</sup> Requires HDCP when playing protected content.</p><p>TM and © 2015 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.</p>

items.name: Apple iPad 2 16GB Wi-Fi A-Graded Refurbished
items.shortDescription: The Apple iPad 2 is a tablet computer designed and developed by Apple Inc. The tablet servers as a platform for audio-visual media, including books, news, movies, games and a world of applications from fun and entertainment to interactive learning. The iPad 2 contains a lithium-ion polymer battery with exceptional battery life and a dual-core Apple A5 processor.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Refurbished Apple MC769LL/A iPad 2 with WiFi with 9.7" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><ul><li>1GHz Apple A5 dual-core processor</li><li>512MB DDR2 of system memory</li><li>9.7" touchscreen, 1024 x 768 resolution</li><li>Built-in 802.11b/g/n WiFi and Bluetooth v2.1 + EDR</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Back 1MP webcam and front 0.7MP webcam with microphone, auto-focus and digital zoom</li><li>USB 2.0 port, 3.5mm headphone jackdocking connector</li><li>16GB onboard storage memory</li><li>Lithium-ion battery</li><li>Weighs 1.3 lbs; 9.5" x 0.34" x 7.31" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Apple iOS 8.4</li><li>Safari browser and iTunes (for applications)</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

items.name: Apple TV with 1080p HD
items.categoryPath: Electronics/TV & Video/Media Players & Recorders/Media Streaming Players
items.shortDescription: The Apple TV with 1080p HD gives you the best entertainment right on your widescreen TV. Choose from thousands of current and classic movies and TV shows on iTunes - many in amazing 1080p HD. Watch live sports in HD. Access content from Netflix, YouTube, Vimeo, and more. And with AirPlay, you can play video, show off photos, and enjoy music from your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch on your New Apple TV with 1080p HD.<br><br><strong>Note:</strong> Selected titles now available on Netflix. Subscription required for Netflix. AirPlay is available on all devices running iOS 4.3 or later. Some features require the latest software. Requires second-generation Apple TV or later.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Apple TV with 1080p HD:</b><ul><li>Buy or rent from the largest selection of HD movies; not all movies are available for purchase</li><li>Buy commercial-free HD TV shows</li><li>Stream from the huge Netflix catalog of movies and TV shows; selected titles now available on Netflix. Subscription required for Netflix</li><li>Browse and play YouTube and Vimeo videos, access online Flickr photos, watch HD podcasts, and listen to Internet radio on this iPhone Apple TV</li><li>Wirelessly stream content from your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch to your widescreen TV. AirPlay is available on all devices running iOS 4.3 or later. Some features require the latest software. Requires second-generation Apple TV or later</li><li>View the most recent photos taken on your iOS device and pushed to your Photo Stream in iCloud on the New Apple TV with 1080p HD. Requires iCloud-enabled device. Some features are not available in all countries. Access to some services is limited to 10 devices</li><li>Watch live and archived MLB, NBA, and NHL games in HD on this iPhone Apple TV. Blackouts and other restrictions apply. Game video is in HD quality when available. NHL and the NHL shield are registered trademarks, and NHL GameCenter and NHL GameCenter LIVE are trademarks of the National Hockey League. NHL and NHL team marks are the property of the NHL and its teams. (c) NHL 2012. All rights reserved</li><li>With an iTunes Match subscription, you can listen to all of your favorite songs in your iCloud library from your HDTV. Requires second-generation Apple TV or later. Limit 25,000 songs. iTunes purchases do not count against limit. Access to some services is limited to 10 devices</li><li>Enjoy all the photos, music, and videos on your computer on the best TV and speakers in the house.</li><li>Stream everything you watch over 802.11n Wi-Fi</li><li>Simple setup with a single HDMI cable for both audio and video. (Cable sold separately.)</li><li>Sleek design that's small, quiet, and energy efficient</li></ul>

items.name: Apple iPad 2 16GB Wi-Fi Refurbished with 1 Year Warranty
items.shortDescription: This refurbished Apple iPad 2 is in excellent working and cosmetic condition and is ready for your immediate enjoyment. Sync with your iTunes account and have extensive access to the Apple App Store at your fingertips. This device is ready for your gaming, movie watching, surfing, emailing, note taking, picture taking or Face Timing — anytime, anywhere.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Refurbished Apple iPad 2 with WiFi 9.7" Touchscreen Tablet PC:</b><br><br><b>Technical Specifications:</b><ul><li>1.0GHz A5 Dual-Core processor</li><li>512MB DDR2 of system memory</li><li>9.7" touchscreen, 1024 x 768</li><li>Built-in 802.11a/b/g/n WiFi and Bluetooth v2.1 + EDR</li></ul><b>Additional Features:</b><ul><li>Back webcam and front webcam</li><li>30-pin dock connector port, 3.5mm headphone mini-jack</li><li>16GB onboard storage memory</li><li>Up to 10 hours of run time on a full charge</li><li>Weighs 1.33 lbs; 9.5" x 0.34" x 7.31" dimensions</li></ul><b>Software and Applications:</b><ul><li>Apple iOS 7</li><li>Media Formats: popular media formats</li></ul><b>What's in the Box:</b><ul><li>Tablet, battery and AC adapter</li></ul><br><b>What's a Tablet PC?</b><br><br>Tablet PCs are compact, ultra-portable entertainment devices that let you read email, surf the Internet, read eBooks, view photos, play games, listen to music and watch video files. Most tablets are based on a smaller operating system, which allows you to purchase and download additional applications from supported stores. Tablet PCs do not have a CD/DVD drive and will not run Microsoft Windows or its applications. Tablet PCs function as a secondary device for casual entertainment purposes, and are not meant to replace a computer. They are ideal for use around the home and on the go with WiFi or 3-4G mobile broadband connections (pay as you go, contract may be required for service).

items.name: Apple Watch Sport 42mm Aluminum Case w/Sport Band
items.shortDescription: <p align="left">Receive and respond to notifications in an instant. Track your daily activity. Control your music using only your voice. Pay for groceries just like that. With Apple Watch, important information and essential features are always just a raise of the wrist away.<br>  </p>
items.longDescription: <b>Apple Watch Sport 38mm or 42mm Space Gray Aluminum Case with Black Sport Band</b> <ul><li>Anodized aluminum case in silver, space gray</li><li>Ion-X glass</li><li>Retina display with Force Touch</li><li>Composite back</li><li>Sport Band with stainless steel pin</li><li>Digital Crown</li><li>Heart rate sensor, accelerometer, and gyroscope</li><li>Ambient light sensor</li><li>Speaker and microphone</li><li>Wi-Fi (802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz)</li><li>Bluetooth 4.0</li><li>Up to 18 hours of battery life<sup>1</sup></li><li>Water resistant<sup>2</sup></li></ul>1 - Battery life varies by use and configuration; actual results will vary. See www.apple.com/batteries and www.apple.com/watch/battery.html for more information. <br> 2 – Apple Watch is splash and water resistant but not waterproof. You can, for example, wear and use Apple Watch during exercise, in the rain, and while washing your hands, but submerging Apple Watch is not recommended. Apple Watch has a water resistance rating of IPX7 under IEC standard 60529. Features are subject to change and may not be available in all regions or all languages. Requires iPhone 5 or later. TM and © 2015 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

items.name: Refurbished Apple iPod Touch 8GB MP3 Player Wi-Fi Digital Music/Video Touchscreen 2nd Gen
items.longDescription: This iPod Touch features Apple's revolutionary Multi-Touch display that allows you to glide through photos, albums, and playlists with a flick of a finger, or shrink and enlarge images with a mere pinch and spread. it has 802.11b/g wireless LAN, so you get a whole new level of entertainment options. Check your email, watch videos on YouTube, navigate your way through the city with Google Maps, and download an endless supply of music, games and apps through iTunes and the App Store. Speaking of games, thanks to the Accelerometer motion detection technology, you can tilt and turn your iPod for life-like controlling. Turn a steering wheel, shake and roll a die, tilt the pinball machine, or simply change the 3.5-inch screen from portrait to landscape view.FeaturesColor: Black2nd Generation 8 GB flash drive3.5-inch widescreen Multi-Touch display (480 x 320 resolution @ 163 pixels per inch) Wi-Fi 802.11b/g wireless LAN - check email, download media, Google Maps, and more!Accelerometer responds to movement - automatically switches from portrait to landscape view; perfect for racing/tap-and-tilt games!Built-in speaker Touchscreen QWERTY keyboard layoutSupport for 480p and 576p component TV outAudio frequency response: 20 Hz to 20,000 HzBuilt-in rechargeable lithium ion batteryMusic playback time: up to 36 hoursVideo playback time: up to 6 hoursUnit Dimensions:4.3 x 2.4 x 0.33-inches (H x W x D, approximate)Weight: 4.05 oz (approximate)I/O Ports:Dock connector3.5 mm stereo headphone jackPackage Includes:Apple iPod touch 8 GB Wi-Fi Media PlayerGeneric earphonesUSB 2.0 cableDock adapterQuick Start GuideRefurbished with 90 day warranty Grade B: Product is in very good condition but may have cosmetic blemishes, examples of which are (but not limited to):May have scratches in caseMay have scratches in the screenMay have hairline crack in caseMay have dead pixelsMay have engraving removed from back casing

items.name: Apple Watch Magnetic Charging Cable
items.longDescription: Charging your Apple Watch is utterly effortless with an Apple solution that combines MagSafe technology with inductive charging. It’s a completely sealed system free of exposed contacts. And it’s very forgiving, requiring no precise alignment. You simply hold the connector near the back of the watch, where magnets cause it to snap into place automatically.
